title: 2015 Armageddon Expo, Auckland: Is league of legends coming? I'm gunna be sad if it isn't :(
body: I don't seem to see League of Legends on the gaming section of the Armageddon website. So I'm curious as to whether League of Legends is coming to Auckland or not.

replies.body: WTF Like honestly i didnt get to go last year so i thought ok I will wait another year it will be worth it :). Now i see this bullshit about not being there this year ugh seriously screw that...

Hey dude,

We're not doing the event circuit this year. We're focusing on our first ever standalone esports events in the OPL final that was at Luna Park in Sydney and the upcoming IWCA Allstars in Melbourne.

Was a blast to meet you all at Arma last year, was my first ever visit to New Zealand and it was great, if a little chilly.

Hey so as sad as me and my mates are about not seeing riot at Armageddon this year (As i went last year and convinced my other friends to road trip up the country this year) I am still wondering if there will be any riot Skin codes available for those who attend and or any change to riot members attending this year's Armageddon. 
Thank you.
Ah, ok :(. Well thanks for the info, sad to not see you here but I hope all goes well with the IWCA. :)
I'm really sad about this. I wasn't able to go last year and was looking forward to it this year D: I especially wanted to see the OCE Riot Staff . Well, I guess it is what it is :/

I am glad that I went last year and saw all the riot staff and took pictures with them (Nearly cried for that seriously lolol)
Have been waiting for whole year of the upcoming Armageddon (Cause I didn't have a chance to attend the tournament last year)
But now, sadly, one year waiting for nothing :( 
Hopefully will be seeing LOL again in the expo in 2016, 

And guess I can only go to the watch Grand Final in Sylvia Park this year :/ {{summoner:3}} {{summoner:3}}
